rows.label: qst710401_msg0001
rows.name:
Mo? Have you been listening
to Rikoko's performance,
mo? I'm so happy, mo!

rows.label: qst710401_msg0002
rows.name:
Rikoko's dream is to become a
traveling performer one day and
play in various cities, mo.

rows.label: qst710401_msg0003
rows.name:
Right now, there are traveling performers
named Leo and Azzaro in this city, and
I've always been so envious of them, mo.

rows.label: qst710401_msg0005
rows.name:
Rikoko should ask to join
those traveling performers
as a musician, mo!

rows.label: qst710401_msg0006
rows.name:
But Rikoko is shy, so it's embarrassing
to ask them directly, mo.

rows.label: qst710401_msg0007
rows.name:
When I'm playing the flute, I'm
happy to get everyone's attention,
but it's strange, mo.

rows.label: qst710401_msg0008
rows.name:
So, I'd like you to ask them on my
behalf if I can join them, mo!

rows.label: qst710401_msg0009
rows.name:
Please convey Rikoko's
passion properly, mo!

rows.label: qst710401_msg0101
rows.name:
R-really, mo?! Can Rikoko
really join them, mo?!

rows.label: qst710401_msg0102
rows.name:
Yay, mo! From today, Rikoko is a
fine traveling performer, mo!

rows.label: qst710401_msg0103
rows.name:
From now on, I can have people
in all sorts of cities listen
to Rikoko's performance, mo!

rows.label: qst710401_msg0201
rows.name:
I want to become a traveling performer
quickly and have people in various
cities listen to Rikoko's flute, mo.

rows.label: qst710401_msg0202
rows.name:
But Rikoko is shy, so
I'll wait here, mo.

rows.label: qst710401_msg0203
rows.name:
The traveling performers Leo and Azzaro
should be playing near the Sachsum Gardens
now, so please look for them, mo!
